Description: 'L'Enfance du Christ: le repos de la Sainte Famille'; the Holy Family served by the angels during the flight into Egypt, with, at right, the Virgin, seated with Christ Child on her knees, and St Joseph standing beside her; two angels kneel before them while a third one scatters flowers above them; scene from Berlioz's 'L'Enfance du Christ', and illustration to Jullien's 'Hector Berlioz, sa vie et ses oeuvres' (Paris: Librairie de l'Art, 1888); signed proof. 1889 Lithograph, on thin paper
Bibliographic references: Hédiard 1906 / Fantin-Latour: Catalogue de l'oeuvre lithographie du Maître (85)
Fantin-Latour 1911 / Catalogue de l'Oeuvre Complet de Fantin-Latour (1386)
Associated titles: Associated Title: Hector Berlioz, sa Vie et ses Oeuvres (1888)
